divs: Sighting Detailsdaytime, sighted hovering silver metal sphere maybe half mile, quarter milehigh. beutifull day outside few clouds. saw abright flash and looked up sawsphere. showed my freind. he saw it to. went home 6 minits away got binoclears.watched thing hover seemed perfectly still for at least 2 hours. got photo.sunwent down same time sphere then slowly decended. at aslight downward angle intolooked like diferent part of horizon. lost sight around 8.00 p.m. to still to bea balloon seemed to not move at all up or down. was interesting.sure would liketo know what it really was.
Summary: round sphere shape silver, flying object,quarter t
